<h3 id="X15171">X(15171)&nbsp;=&nbsp; X(1)X(30)&cap;X(3)X(496)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^4-(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*a^2-(b^ 2-c^2)^2 : :
<b><br>
X(15171) = X(1)-3*X(3058) = 5*X(1)-3*X(5434) = 3*X(1)-X(7354) = 5*X(1)-X(10483) = X(8)-3*X(11113) = 5*X(3058)-X(5434) = 3*X(3058)+X(6284) = 9*X(3058)-X(7354) = 15*X(3058)-X(10483) = 3*X(5434)+5*X(6284) = 9*X(5434)-5*X(7354) = 3*X(5434)-X(10483) = 3*X(6284)+X(7354) = 5*X(6284)+X(10483) = 5*X(7354)-3*X(10483)
</b>
<p>
See Antreas Hatzipolakis and César Lozada, <a href="http://www.hyacinthos.epizy.com/message.php?msg=26753"> <b>Hyacinthos 26753.</b></a>
</p>
<p>
X(15171) lies on these lines:

{10638, 11542}, {10942, 10953}, {10948, 14793}, {11277, 14799}, {11446, 14516}, {11517, 14022}, {12736, 13145}, {12955, 13311}, {13116, 13297}, {13901, 13925}, {13958, 13993}
</p>
<p>
X(15171) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 6284}, {950, 10624}, {1482, 7491}, {3057, 10572}, {5697, 10950}, {6238, 12428}, {7982, 11827}, {12743, 12758}<br>
X(15171) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (65, 12433), (4292, 5045), (9957, 12575)<br>
X(15171) = X(5)-of-Mandart-incircle-triangle<br>
X(15171) = homothetic center of intangents triangle and reflection of extangents triangle in X(5)<br>
X(15171) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 1836, 6147), (1, 9580, 12699), (1, 10483, 5434), (2, 9669, 10593), (3, 497, 496), (4, 390, 3295), (4, 3295, 495), (5, 10386, 55), (55, 4309, 10386), (390, 9668, 495), (497, 4294, 3), (498, 1479, 10896), (498, 10896, 5), (1836, 6147, 11544), (3058, 6284, 1), (3295, 9668, 4)<br>
</p>
